title: Quadratta Serif V14 Italics
content:
Hi everyone

I'm back and i need some comments

Later I will translate the first page of the PDF so you can understand more...

The regular version is coming OK, but I need comments on the Italic!

Thanks in advanced

Ferch

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/quadratta_5412.gif)

author: ferfolio

comments.content:
Hi strass!

my comment is not on the type (that looks great) but in the Portuguese text that is ugly wrong translated. Did you use an automátic translator?  
Portuguese in Portuguese is Português not Portugués.

António Fonseca

Thanks Antonio

I used a bad translator, i'll check on it

thanks! :)

Ferch

[Tipografía-Montevideo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170938/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/)
